[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] This mod adds various zen and rock garden themed decorations. Researching stonecutting unlocks everything.
[h1]Items Added:[/h1] [b]Cherry Wood:[/b] Pink colored wood [b]Ebony Wood:[/b] Black colored wood [b]Zen Cherries:[/b] Secondary resource of the Zen Cherry Tree [b]Persimmon:[/b] Secondary resource of the Persimmon Tree [b]Crabapple:[/b] Secondary resource of the Crabapple Tree
[h1]Objects Added:[/h1] [b]Border Path:[/b] A nice looking border for placing along important paths, hallways, farms, etc. [b]Border Pond:[/b] Similar to the border path, but with water [b]Border Path Pillar:[/b] A pillar made to fit along a border path or border pond. Can be used to support roofs. [b]Stacked Rocks:[/b] A series of stacked rocks, available in two sizes. [b]Artificial Hedge:[/b] Decorative hedges. Colonists can pass through them. [b]Tall Hedge:[/b] A hedge grown for decorative purposes. [b]Dense Grass:[/b] Tall, thick grass grown to hide the dirt ground. [b]Half Wall:[/b] A simple stone half wall, can be built with or without powered lanterns. [b]Flower arch:[/b] Used to decorate paths or wedding spots. Vines grow when it's not too cold, and flowers bloom in the spring and summer seasons [b]Scenic Bench:[/b] Bench for colonists to sit at that gains beauty based on surroundings. Additional beauty is calculated for plants, water, and rivers. [b]Fountain:[/b] A decorative fountain of water, available in two sizes. [b]Standing Lantern:[/b] Decorative lantern for indoor areas. [b]Pedestal Lantern:[/b] Outdoors powered lantern for garden areas. [b]Zen Cherry Tree:[/b] A vibrant and colorful tree often grown for decoration. Produces zen cherries in the spring and summer. Can also be chopped down for cherrywood. [b]Persimmon Tree:[/b] A hardwood tree well known for its delicious soft fruit and uniquely dark heartwood. Produces persimmons in the fall and winter. Can also be chopped down for ebony wood. [b]Crabapple Tree:[/b] A colorful hardwood tree which grows small apples. Produces crabapples in the summer and fall. Can also be chopped down for wood.
[h1]Other Features:[/h1] [b]Orchard Zone:[/b] Growing zone that prevents plants from being harvested, and instead allows harvesting of the secondary resources. [b]Rough Gravel:[/b] Cheaper gravel flooring that cannot be raked. May be found in the world as paths [b]Gravel Floor:[/b] A simple gravel floor that can be raked into vertical, horizontal, or curved patterns - or left unraked
[h1]Save Compatability[/h1] This mod can be added to existing saves. Always back up your saves before adding new mods as there is always the possibility for issues.
[h1]Mod Compatability[/h1] [b]Architect Sense:[/b] All gravel floors grouped together [b]Kura's Extra Minerals:[/b] Gravel floors for stone types that do not overlap Cupro's Stones [b]Cupro's Stones:[/b] Gravel floors for stone types [b]Medieval Times:[/b] Desk requires Cherry Wood (based on description) [b]Survivalist's Additions:[/b] Saguaro Cactus can be grown in an Orchard Zone to produce Prickly Pear; Cherries, Persimmon, and Crabapple can be used to make Vinegar [b]SeedsPlease:[/b] Seeds added for orchard trees
[hr] [h1]mantrasongs description[/h1] Adds decorative garden stuff.
